textBeforeTable: Leisure activities Spa of Yverdon (Switzerland): 3 thermal pools, jacuzzis, bubble bath, massage jets, saunas, steam baths and Japanese. Château de Joux La Cluse-and-Mijoux: open-air museum of military architecture (XII, 17th and 19th centuries), state prison, museum of ancient weapons. Hills International Ski Jumping in Chaux-Neuve. Parc polar Chaux-Neuve: unique in Europe, a meeting with the best friend of man in his wild state. The birth of the pups in dens to howls of different clans, the pack invites you to travel in a world at dusk. A herd of 20 reindeer joined the pack of huskies. Cellars county at Fort Saint Antoine: former military fort turned into a maturing cellar County. Galleries stone cathedrals and houses over 100,000 wheels riding in a unique natural ambience. Beekeeping Labergement-Sainte-Marie: exhibit on honey bees. Casting of bells Labergement-Sainte-Marie: a craft unknown, in one of the last bell foundries in the region, if not France. Lake Remoray. Maison de la Reserve at Labergement-Sainte-Marie with interactive exhibits and original fauna and flora of the Haut-Doubs in scenery and natural atmosphere.
